Improvements.Improvement: Avoid re-assigning loop variable inside loop
Improvements.Description: Re-assigning the loop variable 'tag' inside the loop is not considered good practice. Instead, create a new variable to hold the trimmed value.
Instead of using a lambda in the sort method, use a method reference which is more readable.
